Method Detail

getHost

java.util.Collection<Unit> getHost(Unit hosted)
This API will return a Collection of Unit instances which host the passed unit. The scope is the passed Unit's edit topology and its imported topologies.

For each element in the returned collection there will be a HostingLink which has the passed unit as the hosted target.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
hosted - - The Unit which is being hosted.
Returns:
Collection of Unit of the hosts for the passed unit.

getFirstHost

Unit getFirstHost(Unit hosted)
This API will return a Unit instance which hosts the passed unit. The scope is the passed Unit's edit topology and its imported topologies.

This method will return null if the unit has no host. If the unit has more than one host, one will be returned.

Parameters:
hosted - - The Unit which is being hosted.
Returns:
A Unit which is a host for the passed unit, or null

getHostLinks

java.util.Collection<HostingLink> getHostLinks(Unit hosted)
This API will return a Collection of HostingLink instances from hosts of the passed unit. The scope is the passed Unit's edit topology and its imported topologies.

Each HostingLink in the returned collection has the passed unit as the hosted target.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
hosted - - The Unit which is being hosted.
Returns:
Collection of HostingLinks from hosts of the passed unit.

getHosted

java.util.Collection<Unit> getHosted(Unit host)
This API will return a Collection of Unit instances which are hosted the passed unit. The scope is the passed Unit's edit topology and its imported topologies.

For each element in the returned collection there will be a HostingLink which has the passed unit as the hosting source.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
host - - The Unit which is the host.
Returns:
Collection of Unit of the units hosted by the passed unit.

getHostedLinks

java.util.Collection<HostingLink> getHostedLinks(Unit host)
This API will return a Collection of HostingLink instances from the host to hosted units. The scope is the passed Unit's edit topology and its imported topologies.

Each HostingLink in the returned collection has the passed unit as the hosting source.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
host - - The Unit which is the host.
Returns:
Collection of HostingLinks from the host to hosted units.

getContainer

java.util.Collection<Unit> getContainer(Unit member)
This API will return a Collection of Unit instances which consider the passed unit a member of their relationships. The scope is the passed Unit's edit topology and its imported topologies.

For each element in the returned Collection there will be a MemberLink which has the passed unit as the member target.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
member - - The Unit which might be a member of some other Unit.
Returns:
Collection of Unit of the member link owner for the passed unit.

getContainerLinks

java.util.Collection<MemberLink> getContainerLinks(Unit member)
This API will return a Collection of MemberLink instances sourced by units which consider the passed unit a member of their relationships. The scope is the passed Unit's edit topology and its imported topologies.

For each MemberLink in the returned Collection, the link will have the passed unit as the member target.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
member - - The Unit which might be a member of some other Unit.
Returns:
Collection of MemberLink of the member links which target the passed unit.

getMembers

java.util.Collection<Unit> getMembers(Unit container)
This API will return a Collection of Unit instances which are members of the container unit The scope is the passed Unit's edit topology and its imported topologies.

For each element in the returned Collection there will be a MemberLink which has the passed unit as the container source.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
container - - The Unit which might be a container of other Units.
Returns:
Collection of Unit of the member links for the passed unit.

getMembersLinks

java.util.Collection<MemberLink> getMembersLinks(Unit container)
This API will return a Collection of MemberLink instances targeted at units which the passed container unit contains. The scope is the passed Unit's edit topology and its imported topologies.

For each MemberLink in the returned Collection, the link will have the passed unit as the container source.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
container - - The Unit which might be a container of some other Units.
Returns:
Collection of MemberLink of the member links which are sourced by the passed unit.

getDependentRequirements

java.util.Collection<Requirement> getDependentRequirements(Capability cap)
Finds all Requirement instances for which Requirement.getLink() has the capability argument as a target (DependencyLink.getTarget()). The scope is the passed Capability's edit topology and its imported topologies.

Parameters:
cap - a capability.
Returns:
a Collection of requirements, never null.

getDependentRequirementsLinks

java.util.Collection<DependencyLink> getDependentRequirementsLinks(Capability cap)
Finds all DependencyLink instances which have the capability argument as the (DependencyLink.getTarget()). The scope is the passed Capability's topology and its imported topologies.

Parameters:
cap - a capability.
Returns:
a Collection of DependencyLink, never null.

getDependencyTargets

java.util.Collection<Capability> getDependencyTargets(Requirement req)
Finds all Capability instances which the requirement argument has as a target. The scope is the passed Requirement's edit topology and its imported topologies.

Parameters:
req - a requirement
Returns:
a Collection of capabilities, never null.

getDependencyTargetsLinks

java.util.Collection<DependencyLink> getDependencyTargetsLinks(Requirement req)
Finds all DependencyLink instances which the requirement argument has as a source. The scope is the passed Requirement's topology and its imported topologies.

Parameters:
req - a requirement
Returns:
a Collection of DependencyLinks, never null.

getRealizes

java.util.Collection<DeployModelObject> getRealizes(DeployModelObject dmo)
This API will return a Collection of DeployModelObject instances which are directly realized by the passed deploy model object. The scope is the passed DeployModelObject's edit topology and its imported topologies.

For each element in the returned Collection there will be a RealizationLink which has the passed unit as the realization target.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
dmo - - The DeployModelObject which might be a realization of some other Unit.
Returns:
Collection of DeployModelObject of the realization link sources for the passed deploy model object.

getRealizesLinks

java.util.Collection<RealizationLink> getRealizesLinks(DeployModelObject dmo)
This API will return a Collection of RealizationLink instances which target the passed deploy model object. The scope is the passed DeployModelObjects's edit topology and its imported topologies.

Each RealizationLink in the returned Collection will have the the passed unit as the realization target.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
dmo - - The DeployModelObject which might be a realization of some other Unit.
Returns:
Collection of RealizationLink from realized units to the passed {@link DeployModelObject).

getRealizedBy

java.util.Collection<DeployModelObject> getRealizedBy(DeployModelObject dmo)
This API will return a Collection of DeployModelObject instances which are the realizations of the passed deploy model object. The scope is the passed DeployModelObject's edit topology and its imported topologies.

For each element in the returned Collection there will be a RealizationLink which has the passed unit as the realization source.

This method will not return null.

Parameters:
dmo - - The DeployModelObject which might be realized by some other deploy model objects.
Returns:
A Collection of DeployModelObject of the realization link targets for the passed deploy model object.

getRealizedByLinks

java.util.Collection<RealizationLink> getRealizedByLinks(DeployModelObject dmo)
This API will return a Collection of RealizationLink which have the passed deploy model object as the source. The scope is the passed DeployModelObject's edit topology and its imported topologies.

Each RealizationLink in the collection will have the passed deploy model object as the realization source, and may have a realization target dmo that realizes the passed dmo.

This method will not return null;

Parameters:
dmo - - The DeployModelObject which might be realized by some other deploy model object.
Returns:
A Collection of RealizationLink which target realizations of the passed deploy model object.

getAllImplicitRealizationLinkedObjects

java.util.Collection<DeployModelObject> getAllImplicitRealizationLinkedObjects(DeployModelObject dmo)
This API will return a Collection of DeployModelObjects that explicitly or implicitly realized or are realized by (directly or indirectly) the parameter. The scope is the passed DeployModelObject's edit topology and its imported topologies.

No checks are made on the validity of the realization link endpoints(type, isConceptual(), etc.).

This method will not return null;

Parameters:
dmo - - A DeployModelObject source or target of one or more realization link.
Returns:
A Collection of DeployModelObject of the transitive closure of objects reachable in either direction of realization links to and from the unit (including the object parameter; hence the list is never empty).
